Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: yummy \yum"my\ (y[u^]m"m[y^]), a. very pleasing or attractive; especially, pleasing to the taste; delicious; scrumptious. [PJC]
yummy adj : extremely pleasing to the sense of taste [syn: {delectable}, {delicious}, {luscious}, {pleasant-tasting}, {scrumptious}, {toothsome}] [also: {yummiest}, {yummier}]
